channel.title: Speaking on Lynda O'Leary
channel.description: Recent content in Speaking on Lynda O'Leary

item.title: Speaking
item.description:
I am passionate about Devops, Women in Technology and Technical Communication.

I presented at the following events:

  • 2017 - LavaCon Dublin: https://lavacon.org/2017/dublin/speakers/lynda-oleary/

  • 2017 - SciFest @GMIT: http://scifest.ie/

  • 2016 - Smart Futures STEM Careers Roadshow @NUIG: http://www.smartfutures.ie/

  • 2015 - Google Developers Galway meetup: http://www.collinsmcnicholas.ie/developers-brave-the-galway-weather-to-attend-google-developers-meeting/
